ruling: - If [[UFOroid]] attacks an Attack Position [[Pyramid Turtle]], first the turn player decides whether to activate the effect of [[UFOroid]] or not, and if he does, it will be Chain Link 1. If he doesn't, the opponent has a chance to activate [[Pyramid Turtle]]'s effect and be Chain Link 1. If he does, it is too late for the turn player to decide to activate [[UFOroid]]'s effect.
- If you do not choose to Special Summon a Machine, this card's effect will not activate or start a chain.
